summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Andrei Portfolio website. Backend API tests: 23/23 passed. Frontend tests: All major features working. Fixed critical bug in ProjectDetailPage.jsx (was using mockData instead of API).

integration_issues.issue: FIXED - Was using mockProjects from mockData.js instead of fetching from API. Updated to use projectsAPI.getById()

issues: Album cover images show 'alt text' when image URL is invalid (example.com placeholder)

critical_code_review_comments: HomePage.jsx still uses mockProjects and mockReviews from mockData.js for featured projects and reviews sections - should fetch from API for consistency
Album and Media images use placeholder URLs (example.com) which don't load - need real image URLs
seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up during pytest execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs working. Frontend integrated with backend. ProjectDetailPage was fixed to use API. Social links verified correct (Instagram, LinkedIn, GitHub). Language switcher RO/EN working. Admin login and CRUD operations working. NEW badge displays on recent content. Contact form saves to database.

homepage.notes: Loads correctly with profile data, translations work

projects_page.notes: Fetches from API, displays projects with NEW badge, filter works

project_detail_page.notes: Fixed to fetch from API instead of mockData

media_page.notes: Albums load from API, slideshow works, album detail view works

reviews_page.notes: Reviews load from API, rating display works

contact_page.notes: Form submission works, saves to database, success message displays

admin_login.notes: Modal opens, password authentication works, admin mode activates

admin_crud.notes: Add Project modal opens, all CRUD operations work via API

language_switcher.notes: RO/EN toggle works, all text translates correctly

social_links.notes: Instagram, LinkedIn, GitHub links correct in footer

new_badge.notes: NOU/NEW badge appears on content within 7 days
